name: coffee-flow-local
description: Coffee Vending Machine Management System - Local Development

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && mvn clean install
scripts.db:create: mysql -u root -p -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS coffee_flow_db;'
scripts.db:reset: mysql -u root -p -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS coffee_flow_db; CREATE DATABASE coffee_flow_db;'
